.. _`STAR Index`:

STAR INDEX
==========

Index fasta sequences with STAR





Example
-------

This meta-wrapper can be used in the following way:

.. code-block:: python

    rule star_index:
        input:
            fasta = "{genome}.fasta"
        output:
            directory("{genome}")
        message:
            "Testing STAR index"
        threads:
            1
        params:
            extra = ""
        log:
            "logs/star_index_{genome}.log"
        wrapper:
            "0.66.0-240-gd9cffe8c/bio/star/index"


Note that input, output and log file paths can be chosen freely.
When running with

.. code-block:: bash

    snakemake --use-conda

the software dependencies will be automatically deployed into an isolated environment before execution.
